text: Hianagi ana mika afutmima aheno kararuvazi pristi vahera rama'a omani'naze. E'ina hu'negu zamafuhe'za Livae naga'mo'za zamaza hu'za ana eri'zana enerizage'za rama'a pristi vahe'mo'za zamagra'a zamazeri agru hute'za eri'za zamirera e'za eme zamaza hu'za ana eri'zana eri vagare'naze. Na'ankure Livae vahe'mo'za ana eri'zama eri'nazana zamagu'areti hu'za pristi vahera zamagatere'za zamagra'a zamazeri agrua hu'naze.
